CustomDesktops.Restart_status: Haiku freezes/hangs during restarts on this computer
CustomDesktops.Additional_notes_pt1: Haiku will sometimes hang/freeze during reboots, and will sometimes hang/freeze after booting (i.e. the bootscreen goes away after booting and will either
CustomDesktops.Additional_notes_pt2: shut down, go back to the bootscreen after bootscreen disappears, or fully boot up)
CustomDesktops.Additional_notes_pt3: Sometimes, Haiku will restart and shutdown smoothly. When shutting down, Haiku will either fully shutdown or freeze at the shutdown screen and not power off the computer.
CustomDesktops.Additional_notes_pt4: Also, Haiku will randomly shut down on me for seemly no reason what-so-ever.
CustomDesktops.Additional_notes_pt5: This is a re-submission. Wasn't sure if the SD card drive worked with Haiku when I first submitted this.
